r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - Refactor Yaf_Loader for performance - Refactor lots of codes to avoiding memory allocation - Yaf_Loader::getNameSpaces() now return array instead of comma separated string - Yaf_Route_Rewrite now process multiple repeated bach slashes as one - Removed --enable-yaf-debug, now yaf allows user to moditify variables in $_POST etc - Fixed bug while stripping base_uri
